EmailTemplate.name: TS-2017-09-11-VMworld EU.EMAIL-VMworld EU Booth 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic at VMworld Europe | Win an Oculus Rift & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We enjoyed engaging with you last year at VMworld 2016. Are you attending again this year? We would love to see you again at Booth B514. This year at VMworld Europe we will be giving away great prizes: a Nest, a GoPro Hero Session camera and an Oculus Rift each day of the event.Want to increase your chances on winning these top items? Stop by Booth B514, grab a t-shirt, take a selfie, and tweet the photo with #TurboShirt for an extra entry into the giveaway.
Want an exclusive preview of our next software update? Pre-book an onsite meeting with our team at VMworld! BOOK YOUR MEETING NOW <[[https://turbonomic.com/meet-us-vmworld-europe-2017/]]>
